content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "iron_trapdoor", "quantity": 50, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 4, "index": 19}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft end_stone_bricks, I need to place 4 end_stone blocks in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. I will first move an end_stone block from slot 19 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_trapdoor", "quantity": 50, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I need to move another end_stone block to the right of the first one. I will move it from slot 19 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_trapdoor", "quantity": 50, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I need to move another end_stone block to the right of the first one. I will move it from slot 19 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "iron_trapdoor", "quantity": 50, "index": 10}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}]
thought: Finally, I need to move the last end_stone block to the right of the third one. I will move it from slot 19 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "iron_trapdoor", "quantity": 50, "index": 10}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 64, "index": 22}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that the end_stone blocks are in the correct positions, I can craft the end_stone_bricks. I will move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
